::Spears::

She walked away from Prebon and to Strikers cell.  She peared in and 
saw him in beast mode, standing there.  She cried and looked at him.  
Under her orders, she could tell him nothing, and only reply that she 
was Master Prebon's.  But at least she had Prebon's agreement that 
Striker wouldn't get that slagging chip.  She looked at him, glad 
that he was alive and in reasonable condition. She tried to smile at 
him through tear filled eyes.  She managed to whisper to him,"I'm 
sorry."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon stared at Striker.
> 
> "Striker goes without a chip, if I meet with Ramulus. If I don't, 
he 
> gets the chip and he stays here, with you. So get some rest. Soon 
we 
> go after Ramulus."
